articles.content:
Greetings to Prime Minister of Grenada
    Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Hong Song Nam sent a message of greetings to his Grenadian counterpart Keith Mitchell on the occasion of the 29th anniversary of the Independence of Grenada.
 Wishing him fresh success in his work for the development of the country and welfare of the people, the message expressed the conviction that the friendly relations between the two countries would continue to develop on good terms.
